head.supplied: Melbourne bot. Garden ¶ 22/9/71. ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for your favorable consideration, an application of the Horticultural Society for the use of the botanic Garden on the 11th Novem...

div.p: Y71/12121, unit 576, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to submit for your favorable consideration, an application of the Horticultural Society for the use of the botanic Garden on the 11th November, when the spring show is to be held. It has been usual to make this concession to the Society, but on an understanding, that although entrees are charged, such are not absolutely enforced from those, who may object to such pay.
The file is annotated (1) 'For appl of the Hon. the C.S.'; (2) 'Appd CGD 27.9.71' [= 25.9.71?]; (3) 'For the Director's information W. H. Odgers 26.9.71'.
